title: The Alan Brady Show Christmas Special
description: The 1963 Christmas episode of the Alan Brady Show, featuring comedy musical performances by the show’s writing team.
quote: You’re no Santa Claus, you’re a lady!
studio: Jeff Greg Barb Lou Ben Ray Polly Productions
altHero: Alan Brady dressed as Santa surrounded by women in skimpy Santa outfits
alt1: The Alan Brady Show writers sining in a choir
alt2: Sally Rogers writing cards at a desk
alt3: Robert and Laura Petrie in oversized Santa costumes
